Question
========
  
The concept of probability capitalization has to do with type I errors. If you run three independent tests, and in each of those tests there is a 5% chance of a type I error, then what is the probability of falsely rejecting at least one of those tests? 
Answerlist
----------
* 5%
* 14%
* 15%
* 17%
